mapper.insert: INSERT INTO genre (genreno, genre, seqno, visible,rdate) VALUES (genre_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{genre}, #{seqno}, #{visible}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM genre ORDER BY seqno ASC, genreno ASC
SELECT * FROM genre WHERE visible ='Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC, genreno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE genre SET genre = #{genre}, seqno = #{seqno}, visible = #{visible}, RDATE = sysdate WHERE genreno = #{genreno}
UPDATE genre SET visible = 'Y' WHERE genreno = #{genreno}
UPDATE genre SET visible = 'N' WHERE genreno = #{genreno}
UPDATE genre SET seqno = seqno - 1 WHERE genreno = #{genreno}
UPDATE genre SET seqno = seqno + 1 WHERE genreno = #{genreno}
